entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text: @WhiteHouse @SteveFDA What a coward. The answer was, “No, it’s not true that COVID-19 is harmless in 99% of the cases.” First do no harm. Your duty is to the American public, not to Trump. Shame on you.
